text: واما ان كان من اصحب اليمين

translations.translation: If he is of those of the right hand,
And if he is one of the People on the Right,
If it is of the people of the right hand,
And if he is of those on the right, –
And if he be of those on the right,
And if he is one of those on the right hand,
and if he be a Companion of the Right:
And if he is of those on the right hand,
and if he is of those who are on the Right,
And if he be of the fellows on the right hand,
And if he be of the People of the Right Hand,
And if he be of the Companions of the Right Hand,
And if he (the dying person) be of those on the Right Hand,
If he is a Companion of the Right
And if he is one of those on the Right.
And if he was of the companions of the right,
[56:90] And if he be of those of the right [hand],
(And if he is of those on the right hand) of the inhabitants of Paradise, and all of them are,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ } المتوفى { مِنْ أَصْحَابِ ٱلْيَمِينِ } [الواقعة: 90] أي: من الأبرار الموصوفين باليمن والكرامة الموروثة له من الأعمال الصالحة والأخلاق المرضية
